job.title: Payroll & Benefits Administrator
job.description: pRequisition  1125ppPOSITION TITLE Payroll and Benefits Administrator  This is not an entirely remote position but Hired offers a hybrid schedule working from home and officeppbrppHiring Wage 2450  2550 per hourppFull TimeppHired OverviewppAt Hired we believe every person is one good job away from a stable and promising future We specialize in supporting individuals whose opportunities have been shaped by historic and systemic inequities We strive to provide coaching and skillbuilding opportunities at every step of their journey while helping individuals stabilize by meeting their basic needs and navigating systems of support Through the culmination of these efforts we believe will ultimately enable them to provide for their families advance in their career and pursue their purposeppWe look for these skills in a talented individual to join our team and strive to cultivate an environment that harnesses the collective power of these values and experiences each team member brings in pursuit of Hireds mission and values Hires mission isnbspemto nurture purpose and advance economic opportunity for all through individualized employment and career servicesemnbspOur values includenbsppulliPutting People FirstliliGoing the Extra MilenbspliliAdvancing EquityliliWorking TogetherliulpstrongnbspstrongppPOSITION DESCRIPTIONPRIMARY OBJECTIVEnbspppHIRED is seeking a Payroll and Benefits AdministratornbspHired payroll is processed using ADP Time and Attendance and PayrollnbspPrevious experience with ADP Workforce Now is desirable This person will work in partnership with the HR Director and Accounting TeamnbspHired offers a partial schedule working from home and the officeppbrppCORE RESPONSIBILITIESnbspppbrppPayrollpulliAnalyze prepare and input payroll datanbspUse payroll and time amp attendance systems to produce accurate and timely payroll including garnishments child support direct deposit retirement plan misc deductions and tax withholding updatesliliEnsure accurate payroll and benefit processingliliMaintain uptodate labor allocations in payroll systemliliCreate and process journal entries for payroll payroll and vacation accrualsliliMaintain current knowledge of and ensure compliance with all applicable state and federal wage lawsliliResolve payroll problems respond to inquiries and enforce payroll policiesliliProcess and manage W2 reporting and review quarterly tax returns for accuracyliliComplete account reconciliations for payroll and benefit liability accountsliulpnbspPayroll processing for Program InternspulliSet up interns in ADP for payroll processingliliProcess I9s for new internsliliPrepare MN Wage NoticenbspliliReceive paper timesheets for interns and process payrollliliCoordinate delivery options with front desk and Youth counselorsliliSet up sick and safe accrual in ADPliliPrepare monthly intern billing report for Youth Program Director and accountingliulpnbspBenefits AdministrationpulliProcess benefit enrollments changes and terminationsliliEnsure timely communication is sent to third party COBRA administratornbspliliCommunicate with 401K vendor and ensure timely remittance of employee and employer contributionsliliRun ADP reports to reconcile monthly benefit invoices prior to sending to accounts payable for paymentliliPartner with HR Director during open enrollments  Update benefit changes and set up open enrollmentliulpnbspHR and Administrative SupportpulliAdminister parking and office access cards for North Loop OfficeliliProcess background checks and I9s for new hiresliliConduct new hire orientation in absence of HR DirectorliliTrain new hires in ADP timesheet entries and paid time off requestsliliSet up and maintain personnel files for new hiresnbspliliPeriodically cover for front desk receptionist as neededliulpbrppAll Hired employees must carry out their responsibilities in the spirit of equity and inclusion and to actively participate in intercultural development trainings and eventsnbspppbrppnbspMinimum RequirementspolliTwo years postsecondary education and three years experience with payroll administration and managementnbspliliEfficient organizational and planning skillsliliEffective time management and ability to prioritize worknbspliliExcellent customer serviceliliSkill in written and oral communicationliliAbility to work effectively with othersliliAbility and willingness to respond constructively to rapid changeliliComputer proficiency especially in Excel and OutlookliolpnbspPreferred ExperienceCredentialspolliPrevious experience processing payroll in ADP Workforce NownbspliliCertified Payroll Profession CPPnbspliliKnowledge of grantfunded payrollliolpbrppBenefit offerings include Health and Dental Health Savings Account HSA Flexible Spending Accounts FSA Employer Paid Short amp LongTerm Disability Insurance Employer Paid Life Insurance Paid Vacation Personal Health and Holidays 401K Retirement Plan with Employer Contribution Voluntary Life Vision and Legal InsurancenbspppbrppHired is an Equal Opportunity Employer Qualified applicants are considered for employment without regard to age race color religion national origin sexual orientation gender identity disability or veteran statusnbspppbrppApply online atnbspwwwhiredorgaboutcareersnbspppnbspppnbspp
